Package packfarm

Class FarmAnimal

java.lang.Object
packfarm.FarmAnimal
public class FarmAnimal
extends java.lang.Object
Represents any animal on the farm. Every animal is monitorized until it leaves the farm.
Version:
1
Author:
Oihan

      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object

    • register

      public void register()
      Gets physiological values of the animal with its sensor. If physiological data array is full, then all data stored it is bulked to an external file and the array is reset.

    • avgTemperature

      public double avgTemperature()
      Returns the average of all temperatures of the animal stored until now
      Returns:
      the average of the temperatures registered in the external file. if no temperature is registered, the returned value is 0

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Overwritten from Object superclass in order to properly compare 2 farm animals
      Overrides:
      equals in class java.lang.Object
